SELECT C.CONTENT_ID , C.TITLE , U.USER_EMAIL , C.VIEW_COUNT , C.CONTENT_TYPE , M.OPENING_DATE , M.CLOSING_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TN_CNT_CMT CM WHERE CM.CONTENT_ID = C.CONTENT_ID AND CM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND CM.STATE = 0) AS CMT_COUNT FROM TN_CONTENT C , TN_USER_INFO U , TN_MOVIE M , TN_CNT_PATH P WHERE M.CONTENT_ID = C.CONTENT_ID AND U.USER_IDX = C.USER_IDX AND C.CONTENT_ID = P.CONTENT_ID AND P.PATH_ID = #pathId# AND ( C.USER_IDX = #userIdx# OR ( sysdate >to_date(M.OPENING_DATE, 'dd/mm/yyyy', 'nls_date_language=korean') -1 AND sysdate < to_date(M.CLOSING_DATE, 'dd/mm/yyyy', 'nls_date_language=korean') +1 ) )
TITLE LIKE '%' || #title# || '%'
U.USER_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #userEmail# || '%'
ORDER BY C.CONTENT_ID DESC
